thread.text:
Your GPS tells you to turn left. 

It knows where you are within feet. Would be miles off without accounting for satellites experiencing time differently than you.

Relativity & Space-Time.

Time runs at different speeds depending on gravity and velocity...

From The Frontiers of Knowledge by A. C. Grayling:

"The laws of physics stay constant, but the speed of light is absolute. Time moves differently for different observers."

GPS satellites literally age faster than you do.

Signal gets buried under noise. I enjoy organizing ideas. This is what came out of it.

https://www.cosmictrex.xyz/models/relativity-space-time
